text: Charles Joseph "Joe" Clark (born June 5, 1939) is a politician from Canada. He served as Canada's twentieth Prime Minister from 1979-1980. He became Prime Minister the day before he turned 40 years old, making him the youngest Prime Minister in Canadian history. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian diplomats Category:Canadian Roman Catholics Category:Academics of McGill University Category:People from High River Category:Politicians from Alberta Category:Privy Councillors (Canada) Category:Leaders of the Opposition (Canada) Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada
title: Joe Clark
